raw_body:
WICKRAMARATNE,​ M.A.J. (Retired Isipathana Maha Vidyalaya – Dental Services),​ beloved wife of R.P.K.S. Wickramaratne (Retired Superintendent of Police),​ devoted mother of Prof. Malmini Ranasinghe (Sri Jayewardenepura University),​ Hemantha Wickramaratne (Former Standard Chartered Bank),​ and Lasitha Siyambalapitiya (Former SriLankan Airlines),​ mother-in-law of Dr Sujeewa Siyambalapitiya (Ragama Teaching Hospital) and Hiroshini Wickramaratne,​ expired. Remains lie at 354/​1,​ Delgoda Road,​ Siyambalape,​ Mawaramandiya. Cortege leaves residence for Cremation on 16.02.2024 at 5.00 p.m. at Makola Cemetery.
011619
